name: Magic
content: 我看见你在光芒中穿梭
Been watching you for a while
但当我看着你的眼睛我感觉就像闪电
I never looked in the stars
But when I see an angel on earth'
但当我看见天使降临人间
因为你走路的样子有魔力
Something special in the way you talk
This is real   This is true
I have got the faith in you
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
你必须停止这种欲望熊熊燃烧的感觉
所以用你的爱把我从寒冷中拯救出来吧
I am never gonna give you up
因为你走路的样子有魔力
Something special in the way you talk
This is real   This is true
I have got the faith in you
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
La la la la   la la la
